pageTitle: Visitor Oyster credit no longer needed
description: What to do if you no longer need your TfL Visitor Oyster card.

breadcrumbs.title: Visitor Oyster credit no longer needed

title.title: Visitor Oyster credit no longer needed

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["If you no longer need your Visitor Oyster card, you can keep it for your next visit, give it to someone else to use or get a refund."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"If you're still in London"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Get a refund in person"}
If your remaining credit is £10 or less, you can get a refund from a Tube station ticket machine.
You can also get a refund at a Visitor Centre (except Gatwick).
Your Visitor Oyster card will be cancelled when we process this refund.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"If you've left London and live in the UK"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Get a refund by phone"}

Call:
0343 222 1234 ( Charges may apply )
With your:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Visitor Oyster card number","Address","Bank details - account number and sort code"]}
We may ask you to post your Visitor Oyster card to us.
{"template":"bulletlist"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"If you've left London and live abroad"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Get a refund by phone"}

Call:
0343 222 1234 ( Charges may apply )
With your:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Oyster card number","Full address including country and postal, zip or area code","Email address"]}
We may ask you to post your Visitor Oyster card to us.
{"template":"bulletlist"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Get a refund by post"}

Send your Visitor Oyster card and contact details (name, address, email address and phone number) to:
TfL Customer Services
4th Floor
14 Pier Walk
London
SE10 0ES
We will then contact you to process any refund you may be due.
